categories.name: AI Document Understanding

categories.name: Azure

categories.name: India GST Compliance/Tax Automation
categories.description: Bridges for automated e-invoicing, IRN generation, and e-waybill compliance with ERP and government systems.

categories.name: Lead Enrichment
categories.description: AI-driven integrations for enriching lead and company data from sources like Google, LinkedIn, and Apify.

categories.name: Lead Management

categories.name: NetSuite

categories.name: Oracle Planning Cloud
categories.description: Integrations for synchronizing planning, budgeting, and manufacturing data from Oracle Planning Cloud into databases.

categories.name: Oracle Time and Labor with Biometric

categories.name: Oracle Fusion

categories.name: SFTP

categories.name: Shopify

categories.name: Walmart
